## cprl credentials

AWS credentials

### Examples

```
  cprl credentials
  cprl credentials --aws-profile=dev-account
```

### Options

```
      --gov-cloud   set context as gov-cloud
  -h, --help        help for credentials
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --aws-profile string   overrides [aws-profile] value in cprl.yaml

```
